tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to API key exposure through improperly handled HTTP error responses, which may inadvertently include sensitive credentials in error messages or logs.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/tmc/langchaingo` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information
